ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Data cataloging and governance
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Flexible search capabilities â€¢ Multiple ingestion methods (CLI, API, Terraform, Pulumi) â€¢ Interactive data lineage visualization â€¢ Documentation and governance support
ðŸ“– Summary: Marmot is an open-source data catalog designed to help teams discover, understand, and govern their data assets. It offers features like flexible search, multiple ingestion methods, and interactive data lineage visualization. Marmot aims to make data accessible and manageable within modern data ecosystems.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ Awake-AlarmApp | Dart
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: A customizable alarm application for setting repeating alarms with various dismissal challenges.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Customizable alarm settings â€¢ Multiple dismissal challenges (Math, Shake, Tap, QR code) â€¢ Repeating alarms â€¢ Light/dark/system themes â€¢ 12/24 hour time format
ðŸ“– Summary: Awake is a Flutter-based alarm application that allows users to create highly customizable alarms. It offers a range of features, including repeating alarms, adjustable volume, custom sounds, and multiple dismissal challenges like math problems, shaking, tapping, and QR code scanning. The app also supports light and dark themes, making it a versatile and user-friendly alarm solution.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ python-hdwallet | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating HD wallets for multiple cryptocurrencies.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) Wallet generation â€¢ Support for 200+ cryptocurrencies â€¢ Multiple entropy sources (Algorand, BIP39, Electrum-V1, Electrum-V2, Monero) â€¢ Multiple mnemonic standards (Algorand, BIP39, Electrum-V1, Electrum-V2, Monero)
ðŸ“– Summary: The python-hdwallet library is a Python-based tool for generating Hierarchical Deterministic (HD) wallets, supporting over 200 cryptocurrencies. It offers a flexible solution for developers integrating multi-currency wallet functionality, adhering to standard protocols for compatibility and providing secure seed generation and key management.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ InvenTree | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Inventory management and part tracking for businesses and individuals.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Inventory Management â€¢ Stock Control â€¢ Part Tracking â€¢ Web-based admin interface â€¢ REST API
ðŸ“– Summary: InvenTree is an open-source inventory management system that provides powerful stock control and part tracking. It features a Python/Django backend with a web-based admin interface and a REST API for external integrations. A plugin system allows for custom applications and extensions, making it a versatile solution for managing inventory.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ deptry | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Checking for dependency issues in Python projects.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Finds unused dependencies â€¢ Finds missing dependencies â€¢ Finds transitive dependencies â€¢ Supports Poetry, pip, PDM, uv, and PEP 621 projects
ðŸ“– Summary: Deptry is a command-line tool designed to identify issues with dependencies in Python projects. It detects unused, missing, and transitive dependencies by scanning Python files and comparing imported modules to the project's dependency definitions. Deptry supports projects using Poetry, pip, PDM, uv, and any project supporting PEP 621.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ TurboDRF | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Rapidly generating REST APIs from Django models with minimal configuration and automatic role-based permissions.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Automatic REST API generation from Django models â€¢ Role-based permissions â€¢ Smart pagination â€¢ Advanced filtering â€¢ Full-text search
ðŸ“– Summary: TurboDRF is a Django REST Framework API generator that simplifies API development by automatically creating REST APIs from Django models. It eliminates boilerplate code, providing features like role-based permissions, pagination, filtering, and search with minimal configuration. The primary goal is to accelerate API development and reduce the amount of manual coding required.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ”¥ pipedream | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Connecting APIs and developing event-driven automations.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Workflows (automation sequences triggered by events) â€¢ Event Sources (triggers from services like GitHub, Slack, Airtable) â€¢ Actions (pre-built code steps for common operations) â€¢ Custom code (Node.js, Python, Golang, Bash support)
ðŸ“– Summary: Pipedream is an integration platform for developers that allows them to connect APIs and develop event-driven automations. It offers pre-built components for common integrations, supports custom code in Node.js, Python, Golang, and Bash, and provides a free, hosted platform for building workflows triggered by various event sources.
